metadata.name: The New Mythological Order
metadata.description:
The New Mythological Order is the sacred hollow hosting the genesis of TESTAMENT. 

TESTAMENT is a very special project created by Hugo Comte, composed of 15 monumental photographs, transcending times and culture, transferring and inverting signs and values of a visual heritage taken for granted. 

With the purpose of questioning the belief-generating power of images from the antique icons to the pop culture symbols,  TESTAMENT reclaim what has been given, stolen, retracted or hidden and what could have been shared originally.
